lead_paragraph: Along with all the perils refugees face, women have added accounts of being assaulted, traumas that do not end with their arrival in Europe.

headline.print_headline: Women Travel Migrant Trail Rife With Risk
headline.main: On Perilous Migrant Trail, Women Often Become Prey to Sexual Abuse

snippet: Along with all the perils refugees face, women have added accounts of being assaulted, traumas that do not end with their arrival in Europe.
abstract: Dangers faced by migrants bound for Europe are significantly amplified for women, who face threats of violence, sexual assault, sexual trafficking and domestic abuse; journey often results in post-traumatic stress disorder for female migrants and need for counseling when they reach destination; abuses pose challenge for European countries, where shelters lack necessary protections for women.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
